entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
